answerText: Aristophanes[10] In The Knights, Agoracritus makes his living by selling this food. Shortly before Agoracritus's appearance, an oracle reveals that a seller of this food is destined to rule Athens.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 9 | 4 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of this author's plays, Agoracritus and Cleon the Paphlagonian get into a shouting contest, and are sent to retrieve oracles to win the favor of Demos. [10] Name this Athenian comic playwright of The Knights and Lysistrata.
